Module gov.gsa.pivconformance.cardlib
Package gov.gsa.pivconformance.cardlib.card.client

Class CardHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.gsa.pivconformance.cardlib.card.client.CardHandle
  • public class CardHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that serves the function of the handle objects passed around that encapsulate a connection to a card in SP800-73

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CardHandle()
      Initialize an invalid card handle object
